summary: DOD relies on a network of suppliers (the defense industrial base) to provide the materials and equipment it needs to develop weapon systems. DOD is required to maintain a data repository of industrial base suppliers to help provide insight about potential risks to the base, such as relying on foreign suppliers. However, DOD hasn't been able to create this repository, partly due to problems it...
title: Defense Industrial Base: Integrating Existing Supplier Data and Addressing Workforce Challenges Could Improve Risk Analysis
